import React, { useState } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function ProjectForm({ postProject, history, params, edit }) { console.log(edit) const [state, setstate] = useState({ projectName: '', startDate: '', targetEndDate: '', }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postProject(state) case "edit": } history.go(0) } const handleChange = (e) => { setstate({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
Modal title
{edit ?
:
}
) } export default withRouter(ProjectForm)
